Elective Modules - Bachelor Information Engineering - TUM - TUM School of Computation, Information and Technology

Elective Modules, Seminars & Bachelor Practical Courses > Module Catalog Elective Modules Informatics
Modules totaling 12 credits must be taken from this catalog.

*In the winter semester 2024/2025, only the repeat exam of this module is offered. The lecture is not offered.
**This module will not be offered before the winter semester 2025/2026.
